metadata.title: CVE-2023-4050 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: In some cases, an untrusted input stream was copied to a stack bufferwithout checking its size. This resulted in a potentially exploitable crashwhich could have led to a sandbox escape. This vulnerability affectsFirefox < 116, Firefox ESR < 102.14, and Firefox ESR < 115.1.

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs102 package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
